description: An abandoned version of a modern subway station. Vines grow through the cracked tiles and the air is thick with dust.
visual_tags: Key Object: Broken turnstiles covered in rust
Palette: Sickly greens and rust oranges

gemini.prompt:
Create a 2x2 grid reference sheet showing the SAME location from 4 different camera angles in webtoon art style.

CRITICAL: All 4 panels must show the EXACT SAME location with consistent:
- Architecture and layout
- Color palette and lighting
- Props and furniture placement
- Overall atmosphere and mood

Grid layout (4 panels, separated by thin white lines):
┌─────────────┬─────────────┐
│ WIDE SHOT   │ HIGH ANGLE  │
│ Eye level   │ Looking down│
│ Establishing│ Medium shot │
├─────────────┼─────────────┤
│ CLOSE-UP    │ LOW ANGLE   │
│ Key details │ Looking up  │
│ Textures    │ Dramatic    │
└─────────────┴─────────────┘

Requirements for all panels:
- Bright daylight, clear visibility
- No characters in the scene
- Detailed environment suitable for webtoon backgrounds
- Consistent visual style across all 4 views


Location: Hapjeong Subway Station
Type: interior
Description: An abandoned version of a modern subway station. Vines grow through the cracked tiles and the air is thick with dust.
Visual details: Lighting: Flickering fluorescent emergency lights, Key Object: Broken turnstiles covered in rust, Atmosphere: Liminal, abandoned, silent, Palette: Sickly greens and rust oranges
